item.title: Arduino Poor Man's Oscilloscope
item.description: This tutorial will show you how to use your Arduino as an oscilloscope. We end the tutorial with a verification portion that uses the Arduino to generate a square wave, requiring a single wire. lxardoscope Lxardoscope is another ArduinoÂ + real-time graphing project that has the potential to turn an Arduino into an oscilloscope. Unfortunately, I was unable to get any readings (the visual graph remained static). Poor Man’s Oscilloscope First, download processing.
